nodes.text: The Republic Central Medcenter neurology unit was one of the many complexes of the Republic Central Medcenter located on Coruscant.

While he was in a coma, Fi Skirata was admitted there only after Bardan Jusik made a few calls. When he was scheduled to be euthanized, Besany Wennen started an armed siege in order to protect him. The situation was diffused when Jaller Obrim arrived with Coruscant Security Force personnel and took Fi safely to his home for continued treatment.
